creator: Viatek Consumer Products Group, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Companion App for your Echelon Flex or Echelon Connect Bike!

Visit our knowledge base with any questions and live chat
https://echelonfit.zendesk.com/hc/en-us

Your feedback makes the Echelon app better for everyone. Please send suggestions to appsupport@echelonfit.com

You can ride one of our many

Featured Classes - Get a fantastic workout and ride with your peers to a diverse stream of popular cycling classes.

On-Demand fitness classes - Take engaging high octane classes any time to fit your schedule. On-Demand classes updated everyday.

Scenic Rides - Ride through the country side, city scene or next to a beautiful ocean, get a great workout while you escape to another destination.

Fitness classes - Choose from our wide ranges of classes such as; Hip Hop Rides, Popular Rides, Upper and Lower body workouts and more.

Extra Mile - The Extra Mile is a mix of strength, core, and yoga that will keep you biking at your best.

Join our Live Sessions!

SUBSCRIPTION OPTIONS:

• CONNECT RIDES ($39.99): Unlimited access to all of our CONNECT BIKE ride videos. This plan includes a 14-day Free Trial. After the trial, your subscription will automatically renew on a monthly basis. You can turn off auto-renew up to 24 hours before the renewal in order to end your subscription.

• FLEX RIDES ($19.99): Unlimited access to all of our FLEX BIKE ride videos. This plan includes a 14-day Free Trial. After the trial, your subscription will automatically renew on a monthly basis. You can turn off auto-renew up to 24 hours before the renewal in order to end your subscription.

• FIT PASS ($19.99): Watch and learn how to properly prepare for and recover from your rides. A mix of strength, core, stretching, and yoga will keep you cycling at your best. Unlimited access to all of our Extra Mile ride videos. You can turn off auto-renew up to 24 hours before the renewal in order to end your subscription.
• FreeStyle Rides are Free - no subscription required.

You may not cancel your current subscription during an active subscription period. A user that cancels during a subscription period won't be charged for the following month. By completing purchase you certify that you are at least 18 years of age and that you understand and agree to our Terms and Conditions at https://www.echelonfit.com/app/terms-and-conditions and our Privacy Policy at https://www.echelonfit.com/app/privacy-policy. No subscription can be cancelled during an active subscription period. A user that cancels during a subscription month won't be charged for the following month.

title: Echelon Fit

container.value:
Viatek Consumer Products Group, Inc.
6011 Century Oaks Drive
Chattanooga, TN 37416

creator: Viatek Consumer Products Group, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Keeping fit and active is a great way to de-stress, stay positive and keep motivated during times of uncertainty. The Echelon Fit App provides studio experience in your home with live, on-demand and scenic classes. Cycling, Rowing, Running, Strength Training, Yoga and more!

Choose to pedal, row, run or FitPass to beat your own personal best or track your performance against the greater Echelon community by viewing the global leaderboard updates for live, on-demand, scenic and FitPass classes.

LIVE CLASSES - Get a fantastic LIVE workout with your peers in our community to get a diverse stream of popular workout classes.

ON-DEMAND CLASSES - Take engaging high octane classes any time to fit your schedule. On-Demand classes updated every day.

SCENIC RIDES - Ride through the countryside, city scene or next to a beautiful ocean, get a great workout while you escape to another destination.

FITPASS - is a mix of off the strength, core, and yoga that will keep you working out everywhere.

ELITE INSTRUCTORS - Train with elite instructors from multiple studios teaching multiple modalities at different training levels. Stay engaged with our supportive community of members.

AMAZING SUPPORTIVE COMMUNITY - Join the global online community. On the Echelon Riders Facebook community, thousands of global riders share their stories, inspire each other towards their fitness goals and support each other with tips, tricks and positivity during this challenging time. We are helping to bring together, build friendships and defy physical distances by connecting people across states and even across countries.

ECHELON CHALLENGES - Looking to level up your fitness game? Introducing new challenges in our Echelon Fit App! Race against friends and family members to see who can complete these challenges the fastest and earn a badge every-time you complete a new challenge. Who’s in?

STRIDE TREADMILL - Patented Auto Folding Stride Treadmill lets you run with upbeat instructors live, on-demand and scenic classes.

ROW - Experience a total body workout with the only toggle control resistance on the handle. Enjoy daily live and on-demand studio instruction from world-class instructors, plus on-demand scenic rides from some of the best waterways in the world.

HEART RATE MONITOR - Connect your Bluetooth-enabled heart rate monitor view BPM and HR zones.

BLUETOOTH HEADPHONE & SPEAKER INTEGRATION - Connect bluetooth headsets, Apple Air Pods and wireless bluetooth speakers for an immersive experience.

ECHELON UNITED: One plan for all products - up to four family members per account.

APPROACHABLE FITNESS FOR ALL: We have classes for any skill level including beginner classes.


Visit our knowledge base with any questions and live chat
https://echelonfit.zendesk.com/hc/en-us

Your feedback makes the Echelon app better for everyone. Please send suggestions to appsupport@echelonfit.com
descriptionShort: We are all staying home for the greater good. Embrace being homebodies together.

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Now when you’re in the red zone, you get a small credit in heart rate points. Just don’t stay there too long!

Classes could disappear on the featured page. We put an end to this magic trick.

The Leaderboard would sometimes not appear during a workout. We made sure it does now so you can always see exactly where you are among your classmates.

Sometimes when taking a class with a heart rate monitor connected it was possible to experience a crash. This is no longer the case.

creator: Viatek Consumer Products Group, Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Keeping fit and active is a great way to de-stress, stay positive and keep motivated. The Echelon Fit App provides studio experience in your home with live, on-demand and scenic classes. Cycling, Rowing, Running, Strength Training, Yoga and more!

Choose to pedal, row, run or FitPass to beat your own personal best or track your performance against the greater Echelon community by viewing the global leaderboard updates for live, on-demand, scenic and FitPass classes.

LIVE CLASSES - Get a fantastic LIVE workout with your peers in our community to get a diverse stream of popular workout classes.

ON-DEMAND CLASSES - Take engaging high octane classes any time to fit your schedule. On-Demand classes updated every day.

SCENIC RIDES - Ride through the countryside, city scene or next to a beautiful ocean, get a great workout while you escape to another destination.

FITPASS - is a mix of off the strength, core, and yoga that will keep you working out everywhere.

ELITE INSTRUCTORS - Train with elite instructors from multiple studios teaching multiple modalities at different training levels. Stay engaged with our supportive community of members.

AMAZING SUPPORTIVE COMMUNITY - Join the global online community. On the Echelon Riders Facebook community, thousands of global riders share their stories, inspire each other towards their fitness goals and support each other with tips, tricks and positivity during this challenging time. We are helping to bring together, build friendships and defy physical distances by connecting people across states and even across countries.

ECHELON CHALLENGES - Looking to level up your fitness game? Introducing new challenges in our Echelon Fit App! Race against friends and family members to see who can complete these challenges the fastest and earn a badge every-time you complete a new challenge. Who’s in?

STRIDE TREADMILL - Patented Auto Folding Stride Treadmill lets you run with upbeat instructors live, on-demand and scenic classes.

ROW - Experience a total body workout with the only toggle control resistance on the handle. Enjoy daily live and on-demand studio instruction from world-class instructors, plus on-demand scenic rides from some of the best waterways in the world.

HEART RATE MONITOR - Connect your Bluetooth-enabled heart rate monitor view BPM and HR zones.

BLUETOOTH HEADPHONE & SPEAKER INTEGRATION - Connect bluetooth headsets, Apple Air Pods and wireless bluetooth speakers for an immersive experience.

ECHELON UNITED: One plan for all products - up to four family members per account.

APPROACHABLE FITNESS FOR ALL: We have classes for any skill level including beginner classes.


Visit our knowledge base with any questions and live chat
https://echelonfit.zendesk.com/hc/en-us

Your feedback makes the Echelon app better for everyone. Please send suggestions to appsupport@echelonfit.com

title: Echelon Fit

container.value:
Echelon Fitness Multimedia, LLC
605 Chestnut St.; Suite 700
Chattanooga, TN 37450

creator: Echelon Fitness Multimedia, LLC
descriptionHtml:
Keeping fit and active is a great way to de-stress, stay positive and keep motivated. The Echelon Fit App provides studio experience in your home with live, on-demand and scenic classes. Cycling, Rowing, Running, Strength Training, Yoga and more!

Choose to pedal, row, run or FitPass to beat your own personal best or track your performance against the greater Echelon community by viewing the global leaderboard updates for live, on-demand, scenic and FitPass classes.

LIVE CLASSES - Get a fantastic LIVE workout with your peers in our community to get a diverse stream of popular workout classes.

ON-DEMAND CLASSES - Take engaging high octane classes any time to fit your schedule. On-Demand classes updated every day.

SCENIC RIDES - Ride through the countryside, city scene or next to a beautiful ocean, get a great workout while you escape to another destination.

FITPASS - is a mix of off the strength, core, and yoga that will keep you working out everywhere.

ELITE INSTRUCTORS - Train with elite instructors from multiple studios teaching multiple modalities at different training levels. Stay engaged with our supportive community of members.

AMAZING SUPPORTIVE COMMUNITY - Join the global online community. On the Echelon Riders Facebook community, thousands of global riders share their stories, inspire each other towards their fitness goals and support each other with tips, tricks and positivity during this challenging time. We are helping to bring together, build friendships and defy physical distances by connecting people across states and even across countries.

ECHELON CHALLENGES - Looking to level up your fitness game? Introducing new challenges in our Echelon Fit App! Race against friends and family members to see who can complete these challenges the fastest and earn a badge every-time you complete a new challenge. Who’s in?

STRIDE TREADMILL - Patented Auto Folding Stride Treadmill lets you run with upbeat instructors live, on-demand and scenic classes.

ROW - Experience a total body workout with the only toggle control resistance on the handle. Enjoy daily live and on-demand studio instruction from world-class instructors, plus on-demand scenic rides from some of the best waterways in the world.

HEART RATE MONITOR - Connect your Bluetooth-enabled heart rate monitor view BPM and HR zones.

BLUETOOTH HEADPHONE & SPEAKER INTEGRATION - Connect bluetooth headsets, Apple Air Pods and wireless bluetooth speakers for an immersive experience.

ECHELON UNITED: One plan for all products - up to four family members per account.

APPROACHABLE FITNESS FOR ALL: We have classes for any skill level including beginner classes.


Visit our knowledge base with any questions and live chat
https://echelonfit.zendesk.com/hc/en-us

Your feedback makes the Echelon app better for everyone. Please send suggestions to appsupport@echelonfit.com

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
An all new onboarding experience for users that ensures all metrics are accurate for workouts.

Adding new users can now fill out their entire profile without going to the member site.

General bug fixes and performance improvements.

SCENIC RIDES - Ride through the countryside, city scene or next to a beautiful ocean, get a great workout while you escape to another destination.

FITPASS - is a mix of off the strength, core, and yoga that will keep you working out everywhere.

ELITE INSTRUCTORS - Train with elite instructors from multiple studios teaching multiple modalities at different training levels. Stay engaged with our supportive community of members.

AMAZING SUPPORTIVE COMMUNITY - Join the global online community.
